A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Fun for the kiddies and many casual viewers; but for adults and fans of the franchise in particular\, this film is a hot mess: a poorly paced series of plot holes and lazy writing which ultimately fails to develop the vastly unexplained narrative context of Episode Seven while sealing the unheroic and undeveloped fate of the original trilogy heroes\, leaving fans and casual viewers alike with less compelling replacement heroes and villains operating in a Star Wars franchise absent any coherent\, unifying vision.
